channel.title: Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine error!
channel.description:
Well, i have a 508 server and client called tokkulscape, or aka mezzyscape, its version 3.5! I need help, i have a windows 7 64 bit machine, when i turn on the compiler it says
Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine
HELP ME, why does it do that!!!!!! My code in the compiler is,
@echo off Title Mezzyscape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause
Maybe i need to change something, my directory is C:\Users\Daniel S\Downloads\RSPS\Mezzy_Scape_508_Source_V3.5\Mezzy-Scape 508 Source V3.5\cmd PLEASE TELL ME IF I NEED TO MOVE MY FILE OR CHANGE SOME THING. No homo but if you help ill love you for life!!!!!!!

item.title: Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the java virtual machine error!
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

Well, i have a 508 server and client called tokkulscape, or aka mezzyscape, its version 3.5! I need help, i have a windows 7 64 bit machine, when i turn on the compiler it says

Unrecognized option: -d
Could not create the java virtual machine

HELP ME, why does it do that!!!
My code in the compiler is,

@echo off
Title Mezzyscape Compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

Maybe i need to change something, my directory is
C:\Users\Daniel S\Downloads\RSPS\Mezzy_Scape_508_Source_V3.5\Mezzy-Scape 508 Source V3.5\cmd
PLEASE TELL ME IF I NEED TO MOVE MY FILE OR CHANGE SOME THING. No homo but if you help ill love you for life!!!
